        Create new XRGB image.

      • createXRGBImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createXRGBImage(int width,
                                                           int height,
                                                           int stride,
                                                           int[] offsets,
                                                           byte[] buffer)
        Create new XRGB image.
        Parameters:
        width - Image width
        height - Image height
        stride - Image scanline stride, i.e. how long the row is in bytes.
        offsets - Array of size 4 describing the offsets of color bands: { R, G, B, A }
        buffer - Backing buffer.
        Returns:
        Configured BufferedImage

      • getDefaultComponentOffsets

        public static int[] getDefaultComponentOffsets()
        Get default XRGB component offsets.
        Returns:
        Offsets: { R, G, B, A }
